name: Vegan Double Layer Pumpkin Cheesecake
description: This Vegan Double Layer Pumpkin Cheesecake features a delicious gingersnap crust and two layers of cheesecake! It’s surprisingly simple to make.
recipeIngredient: 7 ounces vegan gingersnap cookies (about 1 3/4 cup ground)

itemListElement.text: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F.
itemListElement.name: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F.

itemListElement.text: Add the cookies to a food processor and process until it looks like fine crumbs. Add the melted vegan butter and vanilla. Process to combine.
itemListElement.name: Add the cookies to a food processor and process until it looks like fine crumbs. Add the melted vegan butter and vanilla. Process to combine.

itemListElement.text: Press firmly and evenly into a 9 inch pie pan. Wipe out or rinse the food processor because you will make the filling in it as well.
itemListElement.name: Press firmly and evenly into a 9 inch pie pan. Wipe out or rinse the food processor because you will make the filling in it as well.

itemListElement.text: Bake for 10 minutes, then remove and set aside while you make the filling.
itemListElement.name: Bake for 10 minutes, then remove and set aside while you make the filling.

itemListElement.text: In the wiped out food processor, add the vegan cream cheese, 1/2 cup sugar, vanilla, cornstarch and lemon juice. Process until smooth.
itemListElement.name: In the wiped out food processor, add the vegan cream cheese, 1/2 cup sugar, vanilla, cornstarch and lemon juice. Process until smooth.

itemListElement.text: Remove 1 cup of the mixture and spread into the bottom of the crust.
itemListElement.name: Remove 1 cup of the mixture and spread into the bottom of the crust.

itemListElement.text: To the food processor with the rest of the white filling, add the pumpkin, spices and 3 tablespoons of sugar. Process until combined and smooth.
itemListElement.name: To the food processor with the rest of the white filling, add the pumpkin, spices and 3 tablespoons of sugar. Process until combined and smooth.

itemListElement.text: Carefully spread the pumpkin mixture over the white layer, heaping it slightly in the middle.
itemListElement.name: Carefully spread the pumpkin mixture over the white layer, heaping it slightly in the middle.

itemListElement.text: Bake for 50-60 minutes, until the center is almost set. To test, insert a toothpick in the middle. If it is cold and liquidy, bake longer until the center is more firm.
itemListElement.name: Bake for 50-60 minutes, until the center is almost set. To test, insert a toothpick in the middle. If it is cold and liquidy, bake longer until the center is more firm.

itemListElement.text: Remove from the oven and let cool at room temperature for 30 minutes. Refrigerate for at least 3 hours or overnight before serving.
itemListElement.name: Remove from the oven and let cool at room temperature for 30 minutes. Refrigerate for at least 3 hours or overnight before serving.

itemListElement.text: Serve with Vegan Whipped Cream, if desired.
itemListElement.name: Serve with Vegan Whipped Cream, if desired.
